system.description: A large, long iron nail that can have either a flat head or an open circular head. It is used to wedge doors open, provide grips for climbing, or anchor ropes. A hammer is required to drive it into hard surfaces like stone or wood.
system.unidentifiedDesc: A large, long iron nail that can have either a flat head or an open circular head. It is used to wedge doors open, provide grips for climbing, or anchor ropes. A hammer is required to drive it into hard surfaces like stone or wood.
